about_the_game:
Welcome to the Tyumen region! Lands full of secrets and mysteries! At this crossroads of cultures, many events have occurred throughout human history, many myths and legends have remained... telling of countless treasures hidden here and there! Gather a team of like-minded people, prepare your equipment and immerse yourself in one of the many legends that the Siberian land holds...

Where will you look for treasures today? In ancient burial mounds, which with their secrets excited the minds of the 18th century mound-hunters? Maybe on the site of old villages where merchants hid their wealth? Or maybe you will find the treasures of the last Russian emperor? In front of you are many places on the map, based on the myths and legends of the Tyumen land, as well as historical evidence.

You have a variety of treasure hunting tools at your disposal: metal detectors, picks, shovels, spotlights, various types of cold and firearms, and even mystical amulets and ingredients, because when you deal with ancient treasures, you never really know who or WHAT is guarding them.

Team up with like-minded people with your friends or go on an adventure alone. You can either get an immersive experience in virtual reality mode or find your treasures the traditional way, using a keyboard and mouse.

Ready for adventure? Open the "Gates of Siberia" and become a real treasure hunter! The secrets and mysteries of the Tyumen region are waiting for you!

short_description: Dive into a world of adventure in the game "Gates of Siberia". Explore ancient ruins, abandoned villages and mysterious dungeons in search of treasures and artifacts. Team up with friends in cooperative mode and fight the dead, skeletons and mystical creatures guarding the treasures.
